titles.title: MP140 Father we adore you you've drawn us

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father, we adore you,
You've drawn us to this place.
We bow down before you,
Humbly on our face.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, we love you,
Because you first loved us,
You reached out and healed us
With your mighty touch.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Spirit, we need you,
To lift us from this mire,
Consumer and empower us
With your holy fire.

verse.name: v4
c1
verse.lines:
All the earth shall worship
At the throne of the King.
Of His great and awesome pow'r
We shall sing!
(Repeat)
